name: Cube Rain
description:
Cube Rain is a simple time-killer game. The main goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. To do this, you should not allow the cubes to fall on the platform.

Languages

  • English

Controls

Play with a Keyboard and Mouse:

  • ←, →, ↑, ↓
  • Space
  • Mouse
